data.text: @KarlKimbrough @KMPHFOX26 Oh look everyone….Karl’s at it again trying to discredit a life that he believes isn’t worthy UNLESS it is vaccinated like he commands. Also Karl… it’s none of your damn business. HIPAA & if they state that it’s against the law. Now go get your booster fool
@KarlKimbrough @KMPHFOX26 If you are smart and actually read the article it said whether he was  vaccinated or not  and that’s besides the point
@KMPHFOX26 Was he vaccinated or not? And did he choose not to do it or was he not allowed to do it. Just answer the question!!!

@YetterLori @KMPHFOX26 Some kindness 🙏🏼🙏🏼🙏🏼

Thank you for being a kind human. Hard to locate most days 💔
@YetterLori @KMPHFOX26 ❤️💔 thank you for praying for our dad
@KMPHFOX26 I work in the hospital where he is and see him everyday he’s a sweet man and I pray everyday he will get better.

@KarlKimbrough @KMPHFOX26 It's important that people see that this is the situation in California, regardless of someone's current vax status. If he refuses a vax that's a prerequisite to being placed on the list,  that's a different story.

@MarissarMarissa @KarlKimbrough @KMPHFOX26 It's not about the facility, it's about his priority on the waiting list. If he's eligible for a transplant, why wouldn't his insurer or medical professionals find him a transplant team? My guess is that he is such low priority that there's no point in his local team to move him.

@KarlKimbrough @KMPHFOX26 Exactly what difference would that make to you Karl…? This is a husband a son a father a friend. This is a human being but thanks for trying to make it MATTER LESS because of his vaccination status! What a disgusting take…
